milestones.description: Clive Lloyd has broken the record for most sixes in an innings (2) in ODIs for WI, going past Rohan Kanhai's 1
Gary Gilmour has become the top wicket-taker for AUS in ODIs with 14 wickets, going past Dennis Lillee's 12
Clive Lloyd has broken the record for most sixes (3) in ODIs for WI, going past Alvin Kallicharran's 2
This is the highest match aggregate (565) involving teams Australia & West Indies in ODIs
Gary Gilmour has taken the most five-wicket hauls (2) in ODIs for AUS, going past Dennis Lillee's record
Gary Gilmour has taken the most five-wicket hauls (2) in ODIs, going past Dennis Lillee's record
Greg Chappell has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (12) for AUS, going past Ian Chappell
Keith Boyce has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (7) for WI, going past Fredericks
Holder has conceded the most runs in an innings (65) in ODIs for WI, going past Holder's record of 56
Rohan Kanhai and Clive Lloyd's 149-run partnership is WI's highest for any wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 143 between Alvin Kallicharran and Fredericks
Rohan Kanhai and Clive Lloyd's 149-run partnership is the highest for the 4th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 117 between Doug Walters and Greg Chappell
Dennis Lillee and Jeff Thomson's 41-run partnership is AUS's highest for the 10th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 21 between Bob Massie and Jeff Hammond
Rohan Kanhai and Clive Lloyd's 149-run partnership is WI's highest for the 4th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 48 between Rohan Kanhai and Clive Lloyd
Keith Boyce and Julien's 52-run partnership is WI's highest for the 7th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 25 between Keith Boyce and Alvin Kallicharran
Deryck Murray and Julien's 24-run partnership is WI's highest for the 8th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 15 between Deryck Murray and Keith Boyce
